mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count FROM board b, users u WHERE b.user_seq = u.user_seq AND b.title LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWord}, '%') ORDER BY b.board_id desc LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};
SELECT b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count FROM board b, users u WHERE b.user_seq = u.user_seq AND b.board_id = #{boardId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( user_seq, title, content ) VALUES (#{userSeq}, #{title}, #{content} )
